name: Frackin' Universe
summary: Frackin' Universe (FU) is a continuously evolving mod for Starbound, amplifying the game in numerous ways since the inception of modding. It enhances nearly every element of the base game, introducing fresh mechanics and content, spanning from new mission, biomes, planets, an extensively revamped crafting system, science, research, monsters, tiles, and a plethora of other in-game assets.
